aboutJericho.title: About Jericho
aboutJericho.paragraph1: Joury Villa is located in the historic city of Jericho, often called the "City of Palms" and considered one of the world's oldest continuously inhabited cities, dating back over 10,000 years.
aboutJericho.paragraph2: Nestled in the Jordan Valley, Jericho offers a perfect blend of ancient history and modern Palestinian hospitality. The villa provides easy access to archaeological wonders while maintaining the tranquility of a peaceful retreat.

aboutJericho.locationNote: Approximately 30 minutes from Jerusalem, 15 minutes from the Dead Sea
